alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 24 at 2:38AM MST until November 24 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Areas along and downwind of the Mogollon Rim, from about Flagstaff to Happy Jack to Forest Lakes. * WHEN...From 5 AM this morning to 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Falling tree limbs may cause spotty power outages. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Travel may be difficult along area highways, including US-180 near Flagstaff and I-17 between Camp Verde and Flagstaff.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County; Western Mogollon Rim
